title: FaulkGio
author: FaulkGio
content: Need this to fix some stuff that was damaged during the storms in my city.I Live in Bahia in Brazil and infrstructure here is not the best.Lots of rich people , profitable place.Also tehre is land here to create "coin mining fields" relatively cheap , and no need to pay for power.Interested please contact-me.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: FaulkGio on September 26, 2022, 08:49:52 PM-snip-profitable place.Also tehre is land here to create "coin mining fields" relatively cheap , and no need to pay for power.If you have one of these, please bring the certificate as collateral to the local banks. If not, there's no point in including it in the description.No collateral, no loan.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: 0.06 BTC is $1,149 at the moment. Go borrow it from your relatives or friends if you have no collateral. I am sure they will happily give it to you and wait for one year without getting worried that you won't pay them back.
